articles.title: COVID delta variant as contagious as chickenpox, vaccine breakthrough cases can still spread virus: US CDC - Firstpost
articles.description: Infections in vaccinated Americans also may be as transmissible as those in unvaccinated people, the document said, and lead more often to severe illness.
articles.content:
But the internal document hints that even that recommendation may not go far enough. Given higher transmissibility and current vaccine coverage, universal masking is essential, the document said.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Biden pushes US federal workers to get vaccinated - CTV News

articles.title: Zimbabwe: U.S. Surgeon General Says Putting a Mask Back On Will Help, but Vaccinations Will Stonewall the Pandemic - AllAfrica.com
articles.description: While people putting their masks back on indoors will help reduce the spread of Covid-19 across the country, getting more Americans vaccinated is still central to ending the pandemic, US Surgeon General Dr. Vivek Murthy said Tuesday.
